full_summary:
**Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN)**

**Title:** AN/SSQ-62F (GPS) DICASS Sonobuoys

**Reference Number:** PW-__QF-130-28867
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-30
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-15 14:00:00
**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method:** Non-competitive

**Pre-Identified Supplier:** Sonobuoy Tech Systems, 4868 E Park 30 Drive, Columbia City, Indiana, USA 46725-8861

**Requirement:** The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of AN/SSQ-62F (GPS) DICASS sonobuoys. The procurement consists of six lots over a three-year period, with an option to procure up to two additional lots.

**Standards and Specifications:**

* The product must meet the Production Sonobuoy Specification for Bathythermograph Transmitting Set AN/SSQ-36B and Sonobuoys AN/SSQ-53F, 62E, 77C, and 101A (PSS)
* The product must provide range and bearing to the target for accurate position fixing and be capable of supporting any of the four DICASS acoustic frequencies
* The product must have both Electronic Function Select (EFS) and Command Function Select (CFS) capabilities
* The product must have GPS location reporting capabilities following activation

**Scheduling:**

* Delivery: Indicative date (no specific date provided)

**Trade Agreements:**

* The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**

* Brenden Holmes, tel: 819-664-6516, brenden.holmes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Language:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Submission of Statements of Capabilities:**

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services/goods described herein may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice, on or before the closing date of this notice. 

**Notification of Intention to Negotiate:**

The
